meta_description: Discover community engagement at Muzeo Museum and Cultural Center. Join us in supporting local art and culture.
hours_text:
###  Hours of Operation 

### Days and hours of operation are:

### **Wednesday - Sunday from 11:00am to 5:00pm** (last ticket sold at 4:00pm).

### Special viewing hours for seniors, people with sensory processing disorders and special needs, or vulnerable groups are available from 10:00 to 11:00am on weekdays. Email [**info@muzeo.org**](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007015613/mailto:info@muzeo.org) to reserve space.

### Holiday Hours:

### Christmas Eve: 11:00 am - 2:00 pm  
Christmas's Day: CLOSED

### New Year's Eve: 11:00 am - 2:00 pm  
New Year's Day: CLOSED

Juneteenth: CLOSED

4th of July: CLOSED

Thanksgiving Day: CLOSED

###  Ticket Prices 

### NEW! Admission includes access to all exhibits in the Main and Historic Carnegie Galleries.

### **  
Tickets for Muzeo are:**

### Members | Free **[Become a Member Today!](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007015613/https://muzeo.org/membership/)**

### General Guests ages 14 and up| $10

### Anaheim Residents | $8

### Seniors | $7

### Children ages 4-13 | $7

### Children ages 3 and under are always free.

### 

### Tickets can be purchased online or at either reception desks in the Main or Historic Carnegie lobby.

### Questions about tickets? Please call 714-765-6450

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007015613/https://muzeo.ticketing.veevartapp.com/tickets/view/list)

###  Know Before You Go 

To ensure a smooth and enjoyable visit for all guests, please review the following museum policies:

collections_text:
### Get Involved

Join us at Muzeo, a local museum where people gather to share culture, make art and lift up our community. Whether you are a student studying the arts or a business who desires to advocate for our local artist community, there's a way for everyone to get involved.

[Join](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/https://muzeo.org/membership/)

Our memberships offer many benefits and help to support Muzeo...

[Membership](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/https://muzeo.org/membership/)

[Donate](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/https://muzeo.org/donations/)

Muzeo relies on the generous support of donors like you...

[Ways to support](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/https://muzeo.org/donations/)

[Connect](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/http://eepurl.com/hwBQQz)

Stay connected to all that Muzeo has to offer by signing up for our newsletter!

[Sign up for our newsletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/http://eepurl.com/hwBQQz)

### In The News

NBC Los Angeles says "...one of the best spots to find some seasonal joy has long been Muzeo Museum and Cultural Center." Check out the story [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/https://www.nbclosangeles.com/the-scene/stylish-seasonal-sips-stars-muzeos-monster-mixology-class/3786647/)!

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115070035/https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestravelguide/2025/06/27/a-california-getaway-thatll-make-the-whole-family-happy/)
